actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to make technical corrections in certain provisions of Public Law 96-249 and Public Law 96-265 which relate to information by the Commissioner of Social Security.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Food Stamp Act Amendments of 1980 and the Social Security Disability Amendments of 1980 to make technical corrections in provisions relating to the disclosure of tax return information to the Social Security Administration.

titles.title: A bill to make technical corrections in certain provisions of Public Law 96-249 and Public Law 96-265 which relate to information by the Commissioner of Social Security.
